author: Kan Ting Chiu J:
casename: Raffles Town Club Pte Ltd v Lim Eng Hock Peter and Others (Tung Yu-Lien Margaret and Others, Third Parties)
counsel: Ramesh Selvaraj and Lim Dao Kai (Allen & Gledhill LLP) for the plaintiff; Thio Shen Yi SC and Adeline Lee (TSMP Law Corporation) for the first defendant
tags-parsed: Civil Procedure/Discovery of documents/Whether 'train of inquiry' test relevant to discovery of particular documents/When class of documents sought for discovery considered wide or oppressive/Whether discovery of unrelated documents for purposes of comparison permissible
